commentList.translatedContent: Very, very nice hotel, good location and close to the subway station. Hotel facilities are very high. I only saw the brand of bathroom in movies. Very high-end, super cost-effective and unexpectedly good. Will definitely stay in Beijing again

Exceeding expectations, the outside of the hotel can sit and drink at night, and there are lights like an open bar. There is a restaurant on the first floor and you can also play billiards and read books. It has a very young atmosphere and it feels lively when I go. I went to the restaurant on the first floor to experience a la carte Chinese food, and the taste and price were reasonable. Stayed for almost a week, except that the room is slightly smaller and less soundproofed, everything else is impeccable.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. CitiGO is personally written and designed by an internationally renowned designer to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent guest control". The hotel has always been committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your stay again!

commentList.translatedContent: The breakfast is good and rich. It is a hotel with a sense of science and technology. There are robots to deliver meals. The price is not expensive, but the menu is slightly simple. Some small facilities in the room can be seen very carefully.
Good location

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guests, hello: CitiGO rooms always adhere to high-quality standard German showers, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattresses, feather bedding... Please believe in our sincerity and dedication to create luxury for every guest. The hotel is located at the intersection of Sanyuan Bridge on the East Third Ring Road, Airport Expressway and Jingmi Road, and at the core of the Sanyuan Bridge-Yansha business district. It is close to the third embassy district and is the national fortress of Beijing. The transportation is convenient. The intersection of Metro Line 10 and the Airport Express Railroad is 50 meters away from the D Exit of Sanyuanqiao Metro Station, and it is quickly connected to major core business districts in Beijing. Looking forward to visiting again!

commentList.translatedContent: A hotel with a sense of modern technology, especially the food delivery robots! Convenient and hygienic! The hotel is more like a permanent residence

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: You donâ€™t need a room card to open the door, and you donâ€™t need a remote control to watch TV. Even the air conditioner, lights, and curtains can be controlled by mobile phones. We hope that living in CitiGO is a "cool" thing. Thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO, and we look forward to your staying again!

commentList.translatedContent: The breakfast delay until 12 o'clock is great! It is also very close to Metro Line 10. It is only a few minutes walk away, which is very convenient. There is also a free supper, but you have to eat it before 11pm!

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO. At CitiGO, the breakfast buffet is long standby from 7:00-12:00, so you donâ€™t have to worry about choosing between sleeping in and eating breakfast. Every night from 22:00-23:00, the restaurant provides free supper to warm the body and mind. Everything is just for you to enjoy more intimate care, sincerely looking forward to your stay again!

commentList.translatedContent: For this buffet breakfast, I think the price of this price is too high, the grade is not inferior to the four-star level, the room is relatively clean, and the view of the viewing room should be better~
The hotel is very good everywhere, the transportation is convenient,

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. German showers, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattresses, feather bedding... In terms of sleeping and bathing, CitiGO always adheres to high quality standards. We will continue to work hard to create more and better check-in experience, and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.translatedContent: Also ğŸ˜Œ! you

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing to stay at CitiGO. German showers, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattresses, down bedding... CitiGO has always adhered to high quality standards when it comes to sleeping and bathing. We will continue to work hard to create more and better stay experiences and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.translatedContent: There is no one to live in. It may be the cause of the recent epidemic. The breakfast is also the one I am eating. The room facilities are intelligent, quite convenient, and the location is very convenient.
The hotel is quite new, the toothpaste is brand ora2, the toothbrush is also soft fur, except the room is a bit small, the others are quite good, take the small fresh route
Back pain in that bed

feedbackList.translatedContent: I'm sorry to bring you a bad stay experience. German showers, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattresses, down bedding... CitiGO always adheres to high quality standards in terms of sleep and bathing. We will continue to work hard to create more and better stay experiences and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.translatedContent:
Breakfast is not bad, both Chinese and Western, but the price is a little expensive 69 per person

Good location 5 minutes walk from Sanyuanqiao subway station

1) The room is very small, please walk by if you mind; 2) The service is very average. I stayed for three days and included breakfast. I couldn't find the breakfast information in the restaurant for three days. Please go to the front desk to check. The receptionist must scan the code when invoicing when checking out. After scanning the code, it cannot be retrieved intelligently. I asked whether there are other ways to issue the ticket. I only said coldly that the ticket is issued by scanning the code. Imagine a special ticket. There are hundreds of words in the message, and the words after 10 minutes of typing are not correct. It could be solved with a scanner or other methods. Customers have to scan and type by themselves. It is known as an all-smart hotel and a global flagship store. It has a false name; 3) The signal in the room is not good, the network is average

Especially suitable for young people on business trips, the space is compact, but the bedding is very comfortable, the overall decoration is very modern, behind the checkin desk is the bar, it is estimated that there will be many social activities after the epidemic has passed, new concept hotels, trends

commentList.translatedContent:
Seven stars praise!

Â During the epidemic, many regulations in Beijing stipulate that other hotels are not qualified enough to receive foreign guests, and only star-rated hotels can receive foreign guests. This hotel is fully qualified ğŸ‘ can stay. (I booked another hotel in the middle of the night, but I did nâ€™t want to stay. My friend helped me find you for a long time. Thank you)

A young lady with a good English at the front desk, most of the night, help us print the information needed by the embassy for free, very patient ğŸ‘ (Many printing companies around the embassy did not open the door during the epidemic)

The location of the hotel is very close to the embassy, less than 10 minutes by taxi and 20 minutes by walk. There is a mall nearby. The downstairs turn is the subway station and it goes directly to the airport.

The environment is very good! The interior is very smart and fashionable. They are all electric, and the decoration is very good! Yukata, quilt, etc. are clean and of very good quality!

Thank you so much for passing a few hotel photos. I will come to your house next time I come to Beijing!

commentList.translatedContent: I did nâ€™t want to talk about it, but it made me very uncomfortable as soon as I entered the room. A cockroach was lying on the bed. Although it was dead, it was disgusting and I did nâ€™t ask to check out, but it â€™s a bit too much to say Careless, don't let us see it bad? Let the front desk swipe the room card 3 times in the middle of the room. The room can't be opened. It is also very fascinating to call the front desk to open the room door and waited for nearly 20 minutes.

feedbackList.translatedContent: I am sorry to bring you a bad check-in experience. CitiGO values the opinions and suggestions of every guest. Thank you for your trust and corrections. Regarding the problem of bugs you mentioned, we must check and eliminate them frequently to create a better staying experience for everyone.

commentList.translatedContent: The rooms are small in size, especially the bathrooms, soundproofed, but they are fully functional, reasonable, and have a sense of scientific and technological design. The breakfast is very good, until 12 o'clock and the dishes are rich. There are recreational facilities such as washing machine dryer, small gym and billiards.

The breakfast is ok, the service is very good, basically everything you need (care kits, bags) can be obtained from the front desk. There are also drinks in the freezer, which are also free, and the bedding is also good, much cleaner than the nearby Novotel. At this time last year, I got a little red on Novotel. I will still live in Beijing in the future, and I will recommend it to my colleagues.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO. German showers, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattresses, down bedding... In terms of sleep and bathing, CitiGO has always adhered to high quality standards. Thank you for your recognition of hotel services, we will continue to work hard to create more and better staying experiences, and we look forward to your staying again!

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel I stay in every time I come to Beijing is very good and the service is also very good. The water in our room was gone, and the robot sent two bottles. There was no extra charge for the water imported from New Zealand, but the internet was not good, I hope it can Solve it.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your recognition of CitiGO's service! We will continue to work hard to provide every guest with more considerate service and look forward to your staying again!

commentList.translatedContent: The room is nice, although it is not big but the space utilization is high, and the overall design is comfortable. This TV is really not good, the network is fine but the screen is stuck, and the front desk has checked the TV before check-in, which is really hard to prevent. I like the black window design of the room very much, and it is very friendly for people who sleep sensitively.

Very modern hotel! The overall decoration to the interior of the room is very simple, and the space is reasonably used! Very good location from the store, very close to the subway station! The lobby on the first floor is perfectly used, the room is slightly smaller, but it's all available! Automatic curtains and lighting are really good! It's completely dull after closing the window. I especially like this! Other lights in the room and full-length mirror light are particularly reasonable! The cleaning is very diligent, and the floor cleaners are also very kind!

The lobby bar is very artistic, with soft drinks available at the front desk, and you can get free coffee when you book with Huazhu Club! The corridors and rooms are also very artistic and clean. The walls of this room are how the cctv building was built. In short, the stay is very comfortable

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. A nine-to-five one person is not as good as a fun field for a group of people. I hope that the hotelâ€™s rich and powerful shared living room will bring you more beautiful experiences and look forward to your every stay!

commentList.translatedContent:
Because the company is located in Phoenix Place, it is very unsuitable for business trips-there is no table (and no computer stand) in the room. I sat on a small bench next to the sink and drew a PPT for two hours. pain. I have lived in three or four Citigo in Shanghai and Shenzhen. No matter how small the room is, there is at least a computer stand, but the Beijing store does not. Snacks and bedside lamps are welcome, but Beijing stores do not have them, which forced me to complain about the service industry level in the north.

But if it's just for tourism, the price/performance ratio is still quite high. People on business trips must detour.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: sorry to bring you a bad check-in experience. Your comments and suggestions have been received. CitiGO invites internationally renowned designers to create a shared living room, bar, restaurant, office, reading, and music. In addition to "sleep and bath", we encourage guests to give other time to the hotel public area. We will continue to work hard to improve on the basis of your suggestions and sincerely look forward to your understanding.

commentList.translatedContent: Breakfast is a general buffet, although there is no surprise but it is worthy of the hotel's positioning. The room is small and well-equipped. It is very close to Sanyuanqiao subway station. It is only a 5-minute walk away. It is very convenient to go to the capital airport. The first choice for people!

In Chaoyang District, this store is very cost-effective. It is a three or five minute walk from the subway station. There is a community shopping mall near Fenghuanghui, where basic food and beverage can be satisfied. If you want to pick something wrong, the room size is a bit small. Overall it's really good

Very good, breakfast is also good, but the room is a bit small. Compact. However, one-off toothbrushes have to be requested at the front desk, but there is no way the current policy stipulates. The room is very modern and the curtain screens are all electric.

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
